Hello, just thought I'd ask for your input about special abilities on
exist=
ing characters. As you may know, Gladiator originally intended to
have six =
special abilities for every class, but, of course, that never
happened.(The=
 only class with six abilities is the mage.) So, I just
wanted to ask what =
would be some of your ideas for special abilities
on the classes?

One I th=
ought of that they sort of did, most likely by error, is
exploding fire arr=
ows for the archer. Anyways, just wanted to hear
your ideas.
